thread.title: Storm chasers honor "Twister" star with GPS tribute | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Storm chasers honor "Twister" star with GPS tribute | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: Storm chasers honor "Twister" star with GPS tribute | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Dozens of storm chasers pay tribute to Twister actor Bill Paxton by spelling out his initials using GPS map coordinates in the heart of Tornado Alley About 200 storm chasers spelled out the late actor's initials using GPS coordinates in Texas, Oklahoma, and Kansas Bill Paxton died on Saturday following complications from a recent heart surgery Enthusiasts paid tribute to the actor for inspiring a generation of storm chasers Paxton starred in the 1996 blockbuster, Twister, where he chased tornadoes The storm chasers spelled the initials on a map that was centered around Wakita, Oklahoma, a real town in the heart of Tornado Alley Published: 21:48 GMT, 26 February 2017 | Updated: 02:40 GMT, 27 February 2017 16 shares
